personalInfo.name: José Andradez
personalInfo.summary: I build scalable web and crypto (Web3) solutions using React, Node.js, TypeScript, and blockchain technologies.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Engineer
responsibilities: At Obi, our primary objective is to create user-friendly platforms for web and mobile crypto wallets. We aim to simplify the user experience by eliminating the need for complex seed phrases and providing alternative methods for controlling crypto wallets, such as email, SMS, Telegram, and device-based mechanisms.
Responsible for developing applications using React, React Native, and React Native Web.
Technologies used: Storybook, Jest, TypeScript, Next.js, EmotionCss, and Tailwind.
Contributed to the development of worker solutions for key management, including SMS, voice, and Telegram integration.
Leveraged Twilio flow and services, along with Cloudflare Workers, to streamline these functionalities.
Though not involved in smart contract development, I am actively enhancing the user experience for crypto wallets using innovative solutions.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed the front end for deviantsfactions.com and other related projects.
Expanded my skill set into smart contract programming using Rust for the Deviants Factions game.
Technologies: React, CSS, Recoil, Emotion CSS, and Cosmos smart contracts.
Worked on blockchain and decentralized applications (DApps).

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Collaborated with companies in both Chile and the USA, focusing on front-end development with React.
Gained experience in state management, CI/CD pipelines, and testing.
Contributed to multiple projects, enriching my skills in web development.
Technologies used: React.js, Node.js, JavaScript (ES6), and Agile methodologies.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed internal tools for Walmart.
Tech stack: React Native, React, and Node.js.
Proficient in Next.js, Redux.js, and React Native for internal tool development.
Worked with Agile methodologies and contributed to the creation of prototypes and mockups to enhance user experience (UX).

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Worked on the SOAP project for Seguros Falabella, focusing on a microservices architecture.
Developed applications using React and Node.js, as well as CI/CD, Docker, and Drone.
Engaged in Agile methodologies to foster collaboration and adaptability.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Involved in full-stack development, utilizing JavaScript technologies including Node.js, MongoDB, Express, and React.js.
Tech stack: Redux, Redux-saga, Mocha, Chai, Sass, Google Maps integration, Docker, and AWS.
Followed Agile principles and engaged in Test-Driven Development (TDD) practices.
Active in continuous deployment using AWS and Docker.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Full-stack development role focusing on JavaScript technologies like Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Utilized jQuery, React.js, CSS3, HTML5, JavaScript (ES6), and Webpack.
Worked on chatbot solutions and engaged in front-end and back-end development.

professionalExperience.title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Contributed to the Browse project on falabella.com, focusing on migrating product list components to React.js.
Worked with React.js, CSS, HTML5, JavaScript (ES6), and Webpack for front-end development.

professionalExperience.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: Developed software using Meteor full-stack and Meteor on the server, with React on the front end.
Developed several internal systems and back office solutions, using Meteor.js, Orion, React.js, and GraphQL with Apollo.js.

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Designed graphical interfaces and communication interfaces with hardware, allowing communication between the SAECO billing system and cable modems, TV systems, and MikroTik.
Used Node.js to manage backend processes and improve company operations.
Developed a monitoring system using the PM2 API and Ember.js, enhancing operational efficiency.
Built an SMS system using GSM modems, RabbitMQ, and Docker, deployed on Raspberry Pi.
Actively embraced Agile methodologies and contributed to UX improvements by developing mockups and prototypes for various modules.

professionalExperience.title: Head End Manager
responsibilities: Monitored stability of satellite signals and ensured the functionality of satellite receivers, modulators, and optical transmitters at the head end office.
Took part in marketing efforts, including designing campaigns and internal channel content.
Deployed a call center using Elastix and Asterisk.
Managed community channels and provided technical support for computers, networks, and IP telephony.

education.details: Technical career of 3 years, with a focus on software development and networking.
Self-taught in most of the current technologies.

additionalInfo: Most of the current tech knowledge are self taught
